mapper.select: select c.id, c.post_id, c.content, u.name as username, u.id as userId FROM comment as c JOIN user as u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id=#{postId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, content, user_id) VALUES (#{comment.postId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.userId});
